lokaye saragima aasiyathika pirimiya lesa rithik namkara aththe brithanyaye ‘eestan ayi’ sangaraweni.this ata hawiridi rithik janatha manapayen anka eka wuye salman khan, sharuk khan, jon eebraham, akshe kumar saha ranbir kapur paradawamini.‘eestan ayi’ puwathpatha rithik aakarshaniya wuye ‘agnipath’ sinamapataya nisa bawa pawasayi.

wiraya ho wirawariya aahara saha rakshasthanayak soyamin awata sarisarayi.
minisunwa gini thiya mara thiyenawa owani waradi, aagamika wenaskam nisa.
